ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly begin to grow and change on [npc.her]. #IF(npc.getBodyMaterial()==BODY_MATERIAL_FLESH) A layer of [npc.earFullDescriptionColour] quickly grows to cover them, #ELSE Just like the rest of [npc.her] body, they're made out of [npc.earFullDescription], #ENDIF and as the transformation finishes, [npc.she] [npc.verb(touch)] [npc.her] new orc-like ears to feel their shape.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldGreen(bat-like orc-like ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair ,#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced,#ENDIF orc-like ears, and are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
